suppress.notes: YAML is not used via jackson-databind, see https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-1471
XSemantics version used was released in September 2022, so it is not affected by this CVE; false alarm. More info on https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-10249

This CVE refers to Xtext & Xtend versions prior to 2.18.0, we use Xtext & Xtend version 2.27.0. The dependency org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xcore.lib has separate versioning (latest version is 1.7.0); false alarm. More info on https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-10249
This CVE is not about org.junit.platform.commons. It seems the check is too loose. See https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-27225
Suppress false positive CVE-2023-35116 in jackson-databind. See issue https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972 See CVE https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-35116
